channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14552] Procedure V2: Reimplement DispatchMergingRegionHandler
item.description: use the proc-v2 state machine for DispatchMergingRegionHandler.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: An implementation using proc-V2 for merge region can be reviewed in https://reviews.apache.org/r/48433

-1 overall

The failed org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.TestMasterFailoverWithProcedures.org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.TestMasterFailoverWithProcedures test timedout during clean up. Seems some env issue. I run the same test suite multiple times locally and all passes without issue; also the patch has nothing to do with this test suite.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-Trunk_matrix #1234 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1234/)

The patch missed the nonce from hbase-client to deal with duplicate RPC call. This is not a regression (on par with 1.x releases), but with procedure support, we should do better than 1.x code base. Hence reopen and attach a addendum patch.

FYI. Matteo Bertozzi
